item.title: ggplot test
item.description: this is only a test library(ggplot2) ggplot(mpg, aes(hwy, cty, color = drv)) + geom_point()

item.title: Compare data.table pipes and magrittr pipes
item.description: There are two ways to chain data.table operation, using data.table pipes or using magrittr pipes. For a data.table dt, the data.table pipes take the form of dt[][][]... and magrittr pipes dt %>% .[] %>% .[] %>% .... Below is an example that compares their readability. The readability of data.table pipes has been criticized in this stackoverflow post. It seems, however, not that hard to follow for those who have basic knowledge of data.

Fatal police shooting in the United States Black people are more likely to be killed by police in blue states than in red states In large urban areas, black people are 1.96 time as likely to be fatally shot by police as non-black people in red states while it is 3.00 times in blue states. For those unarmed victims, the disparity is 3.02 in red states and as high as 4.
